mapper.insert: insert into cart(userid,pro_name, code, quantity,point, d_price, writeday) values(#{userid},#{pro_name},#{code},#{quantity},#{point},#{d_price},now())
mapper.select: select c.id, p.price, p.discount, p.code, p.m_img, c.pro_name from cart as c left outer join product as p on p.code = c.code where c.userid=#{param} order by c.id asc
select code from cart where userid=#{param}
